s0232: Until King Wen and King Wu, they illuminated the previous brightness and added kindness and harmony, served the spirits and protected the people, all were joyful.
s0233: The Shang king Di Xin greatly harmed the people, the common people could not bear it, united with King Wu, to bring troops to the Shang pasture.
s0234: Therefore the former kings did not pursue military matters, but encouraged care for the people's hardships and removed their harms.
s0235: The former kings' system: within the state dian service, outside the state hou service, hou wei bin service, yi man yao service, rong di huang service.
s0236: Dian service offers sacrifice, hou service offers worship, bin service offers tribute, yao service offers contribution, huang service offers kingly visits.
s0237: Daily sacrifice, monthly worship, seasonal tribute, yearly contribution, lifetime kingly visits.
s0238: First month, day renchen, the sun was eclipsed, the officials lost it, the day was not recorded.
s0239: Sixth month, the Rong and Di invaded the west.
s0240: Seventh month, the king went to the eastern capital.
s0244: Duke Xuan of Wei, Jin, first year.
s0247: Beng to Lu, exchanged Xu fields.
s0248: Quwo Wu Gong killed Xiao Zi.
s0249: Zhou attacked Quwo, established Duke Ai of Jin's younger brother Min as Duke of Jin.
s0250: Duke Min of Jin, first year.
s0251: Duke Huan of Song, Yu Yue, first year.
